title: The Compositor's work in the graphic arts
creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith and Printing and Allied Trade Employers Federation of Australia
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Printing as a Career”.
A vocational guidance film showing typesetting by hand, linotype, electrotype and stereotype.
